verses.verse: For <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest<s%> <S%G2983>taken<s%> from <S%G1537>among<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> is <S%G2525>appointed<s%> on <S%G5228>behalf<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%> in things <S%G4314>pertaining<s%> to <S%G2316>God,<s%> in <S%G2443>order<s%> to <S%G4374>offer<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G1435>gifts<s%> and <S%G2378>sacrifices<s%> for <S%G266>sins;<s%>

he <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G3356>deal<s%> <S%G3356>gently<s%> with the <S%G50>ignorant<s%> and <S%G4105>misguided,<s%> <S%G1893>since<s%> he <S%G846>himself<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> is <S%G4029>beset<s%> with <S%G769>weakness;<s%>

and <S%G1223>because<s%> of it he is <S%G3784>obligated<s%> to <S%G4374>offer<s%> [sacrifices] for <S%G266>sins,<s%> as for the <S%G2992>people,<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> for <S%G1438>himself.<s%>

And <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> <S%G2983>takes<s%> the <S%G5092>honor<s%> to <S%G1438>himself,<s%> but [receives it] when he is <S%G2564>called<s%> by <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G7101>even<s%> as Aaron was.

<S%G3779>So<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> did not <S%G1392>glorify<s%> <S%G1438>Himself<s%> so as to <S%G1096>become<s%> a <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest,<s%> but He <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G2980>said<s%> to Him, "Thou <S%G1510>art<s%> My <S%G5207>Son,<s%> <S%G4594>Today<s%> I have <S%G1080>begotten<s%> Thee";

<S%G2531>just<s%> as He <S%G3004>says<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> in <S%G2087>another<s%> [passage], "Thou art a <S%G2409>priest<s%> <S%G165>forever<s%> <S%G2596>According<s%> to the <S%G5010>order<s%> of <S%G3198>Melchizedek.<s%>"

In the <S%G2250>days<s%> of His <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> He <S%G4374>offered<s%> up <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G1162>prayers<s%> and <S%G2428>supplications<s%> with <S%G2478>loud<s%> <S%G2906>crying<s%> and <S%G1144>tears<s%> to the One <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G4982>save<s%> Him from <S%G2288>death,<s%> and He was <S%G1522>heard<s%> <S%G575>because<s%> of His <S%G2124>piety.<s%>
<S%G2539>Although<s%> He was a <S%G5207>Son,<s%> He <S%G3129>learned<s%> <S%G5218>obedience<s%> from the things <S%G3739>which<s%> He <S%G3958>suffered.<s%>

And having been <S%G5048>made<s%> <S%G5048>perfect,<s%> He <S%G1096>became<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G5219>obey<s%> Him the <S%G159>source<s%> of <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G4991>salvation,<s%>
being <S%G4316>designated<s%> by <S%G2316>God<s%> as a <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G5010>order<s%> of <S%G3198>Melchizedek.<s%>

<S%G4012>Concerning<s%> him we have <S%G4183>much<s%> to <S%G3056>say,<s%> and [it is] <S%G1421>hard<s%> to <S%G1421>explain,<s%> <S%G1893>since<s%> you have <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G3576>dull<s%> of <S%G189>hearing.<s%>

For <S%G2532>though<s%> by <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G5550>time<s%> you <S%G3784>ought<s%> to be <S%G1320>teachers,<s%> you <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> for <S%G5100>someone<s%> to <S%G1321>teach<s%> you the <S%G4747>elementary<s%> <S%G746><s%> <S%G4747>principles<s%> of the <S%G3051>oracles<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and you have <S%G1096>come<s%> to <S%G5532>need<s%> <S%G1051>milk<s%> and not <S%G4731>solid<s%> <S%G5160>food.<s%>
For <S%G3956>everyone<s%> who <S%G3348>partakes<s%> [only] of <S%G1051>milk<s%> is not <S%G552>accustomed<s%> to the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> for he is a <S%G3516>babe.<s%>

But <S%G4731>solid<s%> <S%G5160>food<s%> is for the <S%G5046>mature,<s%> who <S%G1223>because<s%> of <S%G1838>practice<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> their <S%G145>senses<s%> <S%G1128>trained<s%> to <S%G1253>discern<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> and <S%G2556>evil.<s%>
